root.name: Baby Boomer
root.description: OverviewIn Baby Boomer, you must use the NES Zapper to protect a baby who continually walks to the right. The baby encounters various obstacles, such as enemies and bottomless pits. The enemies can be shot and destroyed, and bridges can be created by shooting clouds. Like many other unlicensed NES games, it has an unconventional cartridge design. It is a baby-blue in color and has a non-standard shape.
